com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j

Annotation Type JsonRpcError


  • @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface JsonRpcError
    Annotation for mapping exceptions in service methods to custom JsonRpc errors.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      int code 
      java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> exception 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String data 
      java.lang.String message 

    • Element Detail

      • exception

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> exception
        Returns:
        the exception handled by the annotation.

      • code

        public abstract int code
        Returns:
        the exception code

      • message

        public abstract java.lang.String message
        Returns:
        the error message.
        Default:
        ""

      • data

        public abstract java.lang.String data
        Returns:
        the ata. If data is not specified, message from exception will be used. If the message is null, the data element be omitted in the error.
        Default:
        ""
